content: instructions to help get your stitch placement right 2 abb reviations chain chain cluster-st cluster stitch dc3tog in yo insert your hook into the indicated stitch and the same stitch pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops 2 loops on the hook yo insert your hook into the same stitch and pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops 3 loops on the hook yo insert your hook into the same stitch and pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops 4 loops on the hook yo pull through all 4 loops decrease double_crochet 2 yo insert your hook into the indicated stitch and together pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops 2 loops on the hook yo insert your hook into the same stitch and pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops 3 loops on the hook yo pull through all 3 loops fptrc front post treble yo 2 times insert hook from front to back around crochet the post of the indicated stitch complete treble_crochet as normal half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet skip st/sts skip a stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch space/sps space/spaces st/sts stitch/stitches yo yarn over 3 to be gin ch4 join to the beginning chain with a slip_stitch to form a ring or use a magic_ring round 1 ch2 th is counts as the 1st double_crochet 11dc into the ring join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 12dc round 2 ch2 decrease in the same st this counts as the 1st cluster-st ch1 1cl-st in the next st ch1 11 times join to the top of the beginning cluster-st with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 12 cluster-stitches 12 ch1-spaces 4 roun d 3 slip_stitch in to the ch1-space ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 2hdc in the same space work 3hdc in each of the next 11 ch1-sps join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 36hdc round 4 slip_stitch into the next st 2nd half_double_crochet of 3hdc ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in the ne xt st fptrc around the top of the cluster-st from round 2 skip st 1sc in each of the next 2sts fptrc around the top of the cluster-st from round 2 skip st 11 times join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 12fptrc 24sc 36sts 5 roun d 5 ch2 th is counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in each of the next 35sts join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 36hdc round 6 note keep the gauge on your scs loose ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 35sts join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch
